subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Doing his best impersonation of Roy Hobbs in “The Natural,” RICK ANKIEL, below, has captured the attention of Cardinals fans. The team has been streaking, with Ankiel receiving much of the credit because of his three home runs.
snippet: Doing his best impersonation of Roy Hobbs in “The Natural,” RICK ANKIEL, below, has captured the attention of Cardinals fans. The team has been streaking, with Ankiel receiving much of the credit because of his three home runs.
